comments: Note that n^n + (n+1)^(n+1) = A056788(n+1).Becomes "hard" (unknown) around n ~ 112, cf. link: As of today, even A217435(113) (number of prime factors) is unknown. - _M. F. Hasler_, Oct 04 2012

author: _Walter Nissen_, Aug 20 2000
